divs: sighting detailsphone report taken by mufonheadquarters, as this witness has called us numerous times in the past several months about these lights and she has no computer access. witness called in and told hq business office the following: not verbatim, taken from notes. on 12\14\10 about 20 lights went off and broke into a big circle, double or triple the size of the moon. the moon was out, not full, and clouds. the lights move slowly, are orange, red, bright lights. she says she sees the lights every night, and has for about 7 years. when she looks through binoculars, or her reading glasses, it looks like fireworks. she has a few witnesses who have seen things w\ her, a boyfriend, a friend. she would like someone to investigate, please call her.
